name: log
description: Set or remove the log for Emoji Guardian for your server

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove the log for Emoji Guardian for your server

options.name: set
options.description: Set the log for Emoji Guardian for your server

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel in which the log will be located

options.name: compact_mode
options.description: Whether the log should be compact or not
